<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Potion of Quickness](/Equipment.aspx?ID=191)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Potion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=130" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 563 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 90 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Drinking this silver potion grants you the effects of [_haste_](/Spells.aspx?ID=147) for 1 minute.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Potion of Quickness
